introduction.html:p: The Paho project will target the Eclipse Kepler release (June 26th, 2013) with a 0.9 release under Incubator status, and two intermediate releases in 4Q12 and 1Q13.

release_deliverables.html:p: The initial Paho release is comprised of MQTT clients and Sample/Example code.

target_environments.html:p: The Paho C, Java and Lua clients are runtime components to be built and installed inthe user's runtime environment
The MQTT Eclipse Client View also the Java client to run in the Eclipse IDE

internationalization.html:p: None of the Paho deliverables are internationalized.

preamble.html:p: Paho is an incubator project. This first release is targeted at providing client implementations of the MQTT protocol.

description.html:p: This release will be as an “update site” with the primary goal learn and exercise the Eclipse Build/Release process and tools including Tycho
Providing key new client functionality and platform support.
Support for the M2M Eclipse Package and the Kepler release.
